column4: Every so often parts of gnome freeze. I'm running edgy and everything's updated. The bars at the top and bottom freeze or stop responding to clicks
right now just the bottom went, right after an MPlayer crash
Anyone have an idea what might be going wrong? Or know how I can restart gnome without closing out all my apps?
Ive had that problem on a gentoo install, Turned out to be my wireless mouse XD
How would you recover from it? Just restart?
Well in the end I switched to XFCE and a wired mouse, not a problem since
What do you like about XFCE that gnome didn't have?
Runs alot faster for me tbh
Did you install just XFCE or xubuntu-desktop?
If i was you id get xubuntu-desktop
Comes nice and customised with lots of preinstalled software
Thanks for the tips, I'll give it a shot
Never try fluxbox though its poo :P
I've tried it and I definitely agree
